data.content:
noun
plural -books
[count] US somewhat old-fashioned :a bag usually with handles and pockets that is used by women to carry money and personal belongings :purse, handbag
US :the amount of money that someone has available to spend :someone's ability to pay for things
The restaurant has meals priced to suit every pocketbook. [=it has meals that everyone can afford]
People vote their pocketbooks. [=people vote according to how a candidate or issue will affect their financial situation]
Brit :notebook
